WFAPI::GtkGLESDrawer

Detailed Description

GTK based OpenGL ES drawer. Assumes that the underlying OpenGL ES implementation uses X11 as its native windowing system and that GTK is implemented on top of this. For optimal visuals, disable double buffering for the GTK window that is used for drawing.
